item.title: Flybits 宣扬将增强现实技术引入银行业务的信用卡
item.description: Flybits 正在测试一种信用卡，它能让用户比以往任何时候都更密切地关注自己的交易。【原文：Flybits is testing a credit card that will let users keep a closer eye than ever on their transactions.】

item.title: 印尼将下调运输和电力价格以刺激消费
item.description: 印尼将在 6 月和 7 月削减运输和电力成本，并采取其他刺激措施，以刺激家庭支出，重振经济增长。【原文：Indonesia will cut transport and power costs and deliver other stimulus in June and July in an effort to boost household spending and rekindle economic growth.】

item.title: 英国的 "统计极客 "是如何迷失经济方向的？
item.description: 5 月 9 日午前，国家统计局的员工接到一个紧急电话。【原文：Just before midday on May 9, employees of the Office for National Statistics were summoned to an urgent call.】

item.title: 印度季风提前到来，主要作物前景看好
item.description: 季风是一种浇灌印度一半以上农田的天气现象，这次季风比往年更早到达印度次大陆，改善了农作物的收成前景，使人们希望印度将取消对农产品出口的剩余限制。【原文：The monsoon, a weather phenomenon that waters more than half of India’s farmland, reached the subcontinent earlier than usual, boosting crop outlook and raising hopes the nation will lift remaining curbs on exports of farm goods.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称巴基斯坦将于 2025 年下半年接受下一次资金审查
item.description: 巴基斯坦重申了其财政整顿的承诺，国际货币基金组织将在今年下半年进行下一次资金审查，该多边机构表示。【原文：Pakistan has reaffirmed its commitment to fiscal consolidation and the International Monetary Fund will conduct its next funding review in the second half of this year, the multilateral agency said.】

item.title: 特朗普迫使瑞士质疑其对农民的关爱
item.description: 瑞士对美国贸易协议的争取有可能引发与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）一样好斗的政治力量--瑞士农民--的摊牌。【原文：Switzerland’s bid for a US trade deal risks sparking a showdown with one political force at least as feisty as President Donald Trump: its own farmers.】

item.title: 日本表示有意在 6 月七国集团会议前达成美国关税协议
item.description: 日本首席贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世表示，他的目标是在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与日本首相石破茂于 6 月举行会谈之前及时解决关税谈判问题，此前特朗普出人意料地允许两国钢铁制造商建立合作伙伴关系。【原文：Japan’s chief trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa indicated his aim to resolve tariff talks in time for a June meeting between US President Donald Trump and Japan’s Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba following Trump’s surprise pivot to allow a partnership between two of the countries’ steelmakers.】

item.title: 谷歌关联风险投资基金 X 系列旨在募集超过 5 亿美元资金
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，一家与 Alphabet 公司著名的 "月球工厂 "X 有关联的风险投资基金已经筹集了数亿美元，用于投资从该实验室分拆出来的公司。【原文：A venture capital fund with links to Alphabet Inc.’s famed moonshot factory, X, has raised hundreds of millions to invest in the companies that spin off from the lab, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加密货币交易员在芒果市场欺诈案中的定罪被撤销
item.description: 在美国首例与操纵加密货币有关的案件中，一名交易员因利用芒果市场（Mango Markets）的规则从交易所窃取 1.1 亿美元而被起诉，他赢得了推翻定罪的法律挑战。【原文：A trader charged in the first US case tied to cryptocurrency manipulation won a legal challenge to overturn his convictions for exploiting Mango Markets rules to steal $110 million from the exchange.】

item.title: 印巴冲突中使用的中国战机刺激国防股大涨
item.description: 印度和巴基斯坦最近发生的军事冲突的激烈程度令世界震惊，投资者们则关注冲突的另一个方面：尖端军事技术的展示。【原文：As the recent military clash between India and Pakistan stunned the world with its intensity, investors were fixated on another aspect of the conflict: the display of cutting-edge military technology.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司将加入大市值罗素 1000 指数
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）和 On Holding 是准备加入富时罗素 1000 指数（FTSE Russell 1000 Index）大市值股票的公司之一。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management and On Holding are among the companies that look poised to join the FTSE Russell 1000 Index of large-capitalization stocks.】

item.title: 2024 年宠物保险赔付额将达到创纪录的 12.3 亿英镑
item.description: 英国保险商协会（ABI）称，2024 年宠物保险赔付额达到创纪录的 12.3 亿英镑，帮助家庭支付生病和受伤动物的兽医治疗费用。【原文：A record £1.23 billion was paid out in pet insurance claims in 2024, helping households cover the cost of veterinary treatment for unwell and injured animals, the Association of British Insurers (ABI) has said.】

item.title: 新泽西公交公司工程师合同将把薪酬提高到每小时 50 多美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉谈判的人士透露，新泽西运输公司与机车工程师新签署的协议将把时薪提高到 50 美元以上。【原文：New Jersey Transit’s newly inked deal with its locomotive engineers would boost pay to more than $50 an hour, according to a person familiar with the negotiations.】

item.title: 游客因病毒漫画书的地震预测而避免赴日旅行
item.description: 在繁忙的暑期旺季到来之前，亚洲主要市场赴日度假预订量急剧下降。原因何在？有传言称，一部漫画小说预言即将发生地震。【原文：Holiday bookings to Japan from key Asian markets have plunged ahead of the busy summer season. The cause: Rumors of an impending earthquake prophesied in a manga graphic novel.】

item.title: 第六街合伙公司支持的 Caris 生命科学公司申请 IPO
item.description: 利用技术帮助诊断和治疗癌症的医疗保健公司 Caris Life Sciences Inc.【原文：Caris Life Sciences Inc., a health-care company that uses technology to help diagnose and treat cancer, filed for an initial public offering, disclosing shrinking losses and growing revenue.】

item.title: 烧烤季来临，美国牛肉供应减少
item.description: 牛肉和牛的供应量都在下降，而美国阵亡将士纪念日假期正预示着户外烧烤季节的非正式开始。【原文：Supplies of both beef and cattle are dropping, just as the US Memorial Day holiday signals the unofficial start of outdoor grilling season.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州保险公司 Slide 申请 IPO 披露收入增长情况
item.description: Slide Insurance Holdings Inc. 提交了首次公开募股申请，使这家专业保险公司能够在公司首次公开募股缓慢的市场中，利用近期类似上市的成功经验。【原文：Slide Insurance Holdings Inc. filed for an initial public offering, positioning the specialty insurer to tap into the recent success of similar listings in an otherwise slow market for company debuts.】

item.title: 梅洛尼赢得穆迪将意大利评级从 "垃圾 "边缘提升的希望
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）认为意大利的信用评级有可能上调，该公司刚刚与其他竞争对手一道，对意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）推动财政紧缩的做法给予了奖励。【原文：Italy’s credit score is skewed toward a potential upgrade at Moody’s Ratings, which has just joined rivals in rewarding Premier Giorgia Meloni’s push for fiscal restraint.】

item.title: 伊朗谈判陷入僵局，对冲基金更看好布伦特原油
item.description: 对冲基金对布伦特原油的看涨仓位达到了 4 月初以来的最高水平，原因是美国与伊朗迅速达成核协议的前景暗淡，令市场预期欧佩克成员国的原油流动可能会受到限制。【原文：Hedge funds boosted their bullish position on Brent crude by the most since early April as fading prospects for a quick US-Iran nuclear deal raised expectations that the OPEC member’s flows may be curtailed.】

item.title: 华尔街守旧派的糟糕一周，加密货币让仇敌火冒三丈
item.description: 对华尔街的许多人来说，这仍然是异端邪说。一种诞生于反建制神话、被欺诈和不良行为者玷污的资产，不仅能够生存，而且还能茁壮成长。别管无休止的欺诈、交易所黑客等等。【原文：To many on Wall Street, it’s still heresy. An asset born from anti-establishment myth, tainted by fraud and bad actors, not only survives — it thrives. Never mind the endless grift, exchange hacks, and more.】

item.title: 巴拉圭将关键利率维持在 6%，通胀预期保持稳定
item.description: 巴拉圭中央银行将基准利率稳定在 6%，理由是长期通胀预期稳定，符合其目标。【原文：Paraguay’s central bank kept its benchmark interest rate steady at 6%, citing stable long-term inflation expectations congruent with its target.】

item.title: 特朗普在国家安全审查后支持美国钢铁与日本合作
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统支持美国钢铁公司与日本新日本制铁公司之间的合作，称他的关税政策促成了一项投资，使这家美国标志性企业得以留在美国。【原文：President Donald Trump backed a partnership between United States Steel Corp. and Japan’s Nippon Steel Corp., crediting his tariff policies for an investment that would keep the iconic American firm in the US.】

item.title: Salesforce 重启收购 Informatica 的谈判
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，Salesforce 公司正在洽谈收购软件公司 Informatica Inc.【原文：Salesforce Inc. is in talks to acquire software company Informatica Inc., rebooting a pursuit that fell through last year, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 智利财政部长希望释放数十亿美元新投资
item.description: 智利财政部长马里奥-马塞尔（Mario Marcel）表示，继多年来人们抱怨繁文缛节过多之后，智利政府正在准备立法，通过加快审批程序来释放数十亿美元的投资。【原文：Chile’s government is readying legislation to unlock billions of dollars of investments by speeding up the approval process, following years of complaints over excessive red tape, Finance Minister Mario Marcel said.】

item.title: 儿童零售商 Claire's 因关税担忧而聘请顾问
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，由于关税问题升级给零售商的盈利带来压力，Claire's Stores 公司正在咨询华利安公司（Houlihan Lokey Inc.【原文：Claire’s Stores Inc. is consulting Houlihan Lokey Inc. on how to shore up its finances as escalating tariff concerns pressure the retailer’s earnings, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: CommScope 正考虑出售宽带部门 CCS
item.description: 据知情人士透露，CommScope 控股公司正在探索出售其宽带连接和电缆部门，因为这家网络基础设施公司正在出售资产以偿还债务。【原文：CommScope Holding Co. is exploring a sale of its broadband connectivity and cable arm, according to people with knowledge of the matter, as the network infrastructure firm unloads assets to repay debt.】

item.title: 巴西里奥阿托公司与债务重组顾问合作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西可再生能源公司 Rio Alto Energias Renovaveis SA 正在与金融咨询公司 Laplace Finanças 和律师事务所 Felsberg Advogados 合作，担任债务重组顾问。【原文：Brazilian renewable energy company Rio Alto Energias Renovaveis SA is working with financial advisory firm Laplace Finanças and law firm Felsberg Advogados as debt restructuring advisers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 在美国寻求监管稳定币的同时，Tether 将目光投向别处
item.description: 虽然美国国会正在审议有助于将稳定币更多地融入主流金融的法案，但最大的数字代币发行商表示，它将继续专注于服务美国以外的市场。【原文：While Congress is considering bills that would help integrate stablecoins more into mainstream finance, the largest issuer of the digital tokens says it will continue to focus on serving markets besides the US.】

item.title: 特朗普称苹果关税还将针对三星和其他制造商
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他周五早些时候威胁对苹果公司征收的关税也将针对包括三星电子公司在内的设备制造商，以刺激它们将产品生产转移到美国。【原文：President Donald Trump said that the tariffs he threatened against Apple Inc. earlier Friday would also be aimed at device makers including Samsung Electronics Co. to spur them into moving manufacturing of their products to the US.】
